I do like this dress. And would order another one. I should have washed it separately first, as the color will bleed a little. I was lucky that it happened on back of a pink dress. I’m 5’3 135lb. Medium worked for me.

I really like this even though I am a larger size. Because of my belly I always wear a good shaper under my dresses that goes down far enough on my thighs also as to never make a leg bulge. When this dress arrived and I first tried it on, I was thrilled with how cute it is. Fast forward three weeks to when I was going to wear it in Cabo…this time when I put it on I had my shaper on already, certain it would like even better with the shaper than it had without it. And it did!! That is, until my eyes scanned down to my knees and I realized that the legs in my shaper were longer than the lining of the dress!!!! Urgh!!! It’s too late to return it, so now I’ve got to try to either add to the lining or find a slip. Slips are not easy to find these days and even if I can find one, just because it’s white doesn’t mean it will work with the white liner. So aggravated!!! Of course, I could wear a shorter legged shaper, but then my experience tells me it will create an indention on my flabby legs. For those of you who have toned legs, I highly recommend it- no matter your age!! But if you don’t want much above your knee to show, beware.
Great fit, beautiful color. Love the eyelet lace design. I actual have it in this blue and white.

评论概述: Great Dress / ignore the negative reviews
评论详情: I rarely leave reviews but I felt like I had to on the little gem because there were so many mixed reviews. I’m 47, 5’ 5” and weigh 148 with a 36D bust. I purchased a medium in the navy blue. I have no idea why some reviews feel this dress is “boxy” unless they purchased a size that was way too big! In no way does this dress look or feel boxy. The overlay on the dress is unique in my opinion. I can push my regular bra straps down and all looks great. Still have the support of my regular bra without it being seen. The dress in my opinion is a winner. It can be paired with a tan sandal for a more casual look or a nude strappy heel for a more dressed up feel. The ONLY reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it puckers slightly at the top of the back. It’s not anything to worry about and certainly won’t stop me from keeping the item and wearing it.
Material felt cheap and was very boxy
This dress was cute, but an xl fit my size 0 teenager.
If you have a very narrow body frame this dress is now for you. Very unflattering
I was a between sizes and should have sized up. But the color is gorgeous. I love the detail. Good length. The sleeves can be worn up or down. I’m going to grab the next size to keep
Loved the dress

The style is super cute and I got some compliments.  I'm 5'0 165 and I got the Medium, it hit me like an inch or two above the knees and a bit snug but not enough where I had to exchange it. I would've been more comfortable in a Large. The lace Fabric is just a little stiff but not enough to make me itch and it was also a bit transparent but because of the second layer of lace, you couldn't see through it.
The fabric is thick and itchy!  Very short… I had to return it!
Best fitting dress ever!  Hides imperfections ~ Accentuates legs and shoulders~ durable material ~ rich color… appropriate for many occasions  ~ extremely comfortable*****

I bought this dress for a summer event and I loved the style.  The first one that I bought I returned because of the workmanship.  If you  look at some of the photos other customers provided you can see that some of the fabrics loops funny.  The second dress I ordered didn't have the funny bits of fabric sticking up.  I will say that I did take a few stitches to tack down the fabric over the shoulder area. Unfortunately the wide elastic looks cheap so I decided to tack the fabric around so that the elastic was covered.  All in all a cute dress for the price.
Wore it for my moms 90th bd party

This dress is really cute. It was be worn for multiple occasions. You can wear it with some flat sandals for a casual night out or dress it up with heals.  I love the color. I do understand what other reviewers meant by the heaviness but for me I am fine with it. I cannot wait to wear it.
Love it!  Lace was thick and lining was good material.  I’m 132lbs 5’1 and medium fit perfect.
My body is hour glass shaped. This dress fits everywhere except my waist, there’s way too much extra fabric in the waist area. :(
Excellent value! True to size. I’m 42 bust and got the xl. It is fully lined was not see through for me with flesh colored undergarments.  Machine wash. Line dry.  Get it in every color.
I didn’t like the length of the dress, it felt too short.

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this dress. You just never know with clothing on Amazon. (On the same day, received another dress, felt it, and  immediately returned it). If this is the quality of this brand, i will be buying more! Much more!

I really loved the fit of this dress and took it to my vacation in Mexico. Its a very bright fluorescent green  - perfect for resort wear. Not sure I will feel comfortable wearing that color anywhere else so I’m considering ordering another color. I love that the elastic holds the shoulders in place so that you are not constantly adjusting. The length is perfect for me - just above the knee. I would recommend buying.

It's a pretty dress.  It wasn't flattering one me but I can see where it would be on others;  it's not slimming so I don't feel it's great for us size 14 chubby girls.  I ordered the LIGHT pink, but be advised that it's actually very bright.  Also, in spite of ordering an XL (usually wear an L), it was tight across the bust.  The material is a heavy feeling, not as light as the pictures make it out to be and it's not as open work, lacy and light as I hoped it would be.  I was disappointed, as it had good reviews from others.

I bought this to wear to a wedding and got compliments all night long from close friends to complete strangers! It's elegant, yet comfortable. The style would flatter many body shapes. Love this dress so much I may order it in other colors.
Good quality, well made.  Beautiful and fits to size.h
